summary: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.
cast: Brad Pitt|Catherine Zeta-Jones|Michelle Pfeiffer|Joseph Fiennes|Dennis Haysbert|Timothy West|Adriano Giannini|Raman Hui|Chung Chan|Jim Cummings|Conrad Vernon|Andrew Birch|Chris Miller|Frank Welker
title: Simbad: La leyenda de los siete mares
